answers.answer: one reading does NOT make diagnoses.  especially after surgery.  you might want to check up on it yearly.  Id ask for a OGT test Oral glucose tolerance test.

question: Me glucose blood test have been between 99 and 110  for the past 5 years. I recently had surgery (parathyroiddectomy) Right after surgery my blood glucose was 180. The next day it was 110. What does the 180 reading mean? Do I have diabetes?
title: 1 READING 189!
